node.text:
What could be more comforting than a relaxed Christmas Day brunch with plenty of warm food & warm company of family and friends. The festive brunch at The Raviz Kadavu on December 25th is offered at a special rate of Rs.1200/- plus taxes. There is a 50% discount for children under 12. Catch a performance by the Live Band as well.
